page.title: 19Dialect in Aith
page.content: {Da Wadder.}In Shetlan da wadder is aften coorse, wi wind an rain, bit dere's a fine start noo an again an we hae some boanny days idda simmer. Idda simmer da nichts ir braaly licht bit idda winter it's aafil dark an whin da bairns come haem fae da skule da sky is aa black. Sometimes da fans o sna block da rods so bairns canna win tae da skule. {The Weather.}In Shetland the weather is often rough, with wind and rain, but there is a fine spell now and again and we have some beautiful days in summer. In summer the nights are quite light but in winter it is very dark and when the children come home from school the sky is all black. Sometimes the drifts of snow block the roads so that the children cannot get to school.
